change_council_job_desc: If you think that §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is better suited for another job on the council you can exchange [Root.GetHerHis] current council job for another one.
IS_AFFECTED_BY_AN_ACTIVE_REALM_PEACE: Is being affected by an active Realm Peace.
IS_NOT_AFFECTED_BY_AN_ACTIVE_REALM_PEACE: Is NOT being affected by an active Realm Peace.
AIREASON_EXPANDING_HORDE: Too busy conquering the world and you're next:
INTERACTION_TYRANNY_AGAINST_COUNCIL: §RGoing against the will of The Council will be viewed as an act of tyranny!§!
FORCE_JOIN_FACTION_INTERACTION_DESC: Spend a §YFavor§! to force §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! to join your factions.
FORCE_JOIN_FACTION_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to have them join the factions you started.
FORCE_JOIN_FACTION_INTERACTION_LETTER: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you join the factions I have started.
FORCE_JOIN_FACTION_INTERACTION_ACCEPT_LO: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to force them to join all their factions.
CAN_JOIN_ONE_FACTION: $RECIPIENT|Y$ can join at least one of your factions
NOT_DISSUADED_FROM_FACTIONS: $RECIPIENT|Y$ has not been forbidden to join factions
LEAVE_FACTION_COERCED: Can't leave faction because you were coerced into joining
INVITE_FAVOR_LIEGE_RELATIVE: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must not be a close relative of $LIEGE|Y$
INVITE_FAVOR_JOB: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must not have a Council position
ASK_REALM_PEACE_INTERACTION_DESC: Spend a §YFavor§! to ask your liege to enforce §YRealm Peace§!.
ASK_REALM_PEACE_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to force them to start enforcing §YRealm Peace§!.
ASK_REALM_PEACE_INTERACTION_LETTER: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you start enforcing peace through the realm.
ASK_REALM_PEACE_INTERACTION_ACCEPT_LOG: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to force them to enforce the §YRealm Peace§!.
ASK_COUNCIL_POSITION_INTERACTION_DESC: Spend a §YFavor§! to demand a §YCouncil§! position from your liege.
ASK_COUNCIL_POSITION_INTERACTION_LONG_DE: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to force them to give you a position on the §YCouncil§!.
ASK_COUNCIL_POSITION_INTERACTION_LETTER: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you give me my rightful position on your council.
ASK_COUNCIL_POSITION_INTERACTION_LETTER_: \nIn return for the favor you owe me, give me a position on your council.
ASK_COUNCIL_POSITION_INTERACTION_ACCEPT_: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to get the $POSITION|Y$ position$FIRED$
coerced_into_council_position: Was forced to give a Council Position
DEMAND_POSITION_MUST_HAVE_POSITIONS: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must have §YCouncil§! positions that $ACTOR|Y$ can hold
DEMAND_POSITION_MUST_CHOOSE_POSITION: $ACTOR|Y$ must choose a §YCouncil§! Position to ask $RECIPIENT|Y$
EVTDESC527: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to join the council as [Title.GetName], despite the favor owed.
EVTDESC528: [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force the Realm Peace.
EVTDESC529: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to force the realm peace, despite the favor owed.
EVTDESC530: [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force [This.GetTitledFirstName] to join their Factions.
EVTDESC531: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] to join [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s factions, despite the favor owed.
TOOLTIP_SoA_5357: This option is available to you due to your §YLustful§! and §YCynical§! nature and your high §YIntrigue§!\n.
stutter_desc: This character is a stutterer. It hampers their ability to communicate effectively with others.
EVTDESC1690: I'm going to be the bestest ruler ever when I grow up!
council_war_off_custom: Council members can join factions freely\n
council_war_on_custom: Council members may only join factions when the Council is §RDiscontent§!\nNomad and tribal Council members can always join factions
CROWN_LAW_CHANGE_TIMEOUT: §RThe Council recently rejected a crown law change. You can attempt to make a crown law change again at $DATE$§!
FORM_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_INTERACTION_DES: Form a Non-Aggression Pact between §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! and §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
FORM_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_INTERACTION_LON: If your dynastic bonds are close enough, you can offer a Non-Aggression Pact to another character.
FORM_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_INTERACTION_LET: \nI offer to form a Non-Aggression Pact with you.
FORM_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_INTERACTION_REQ: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! can form a Non-Aggression Pact with §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!
FORM_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_INTERACTION_REJ: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! has not recently rejected to form a Non-Aggression Pact with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
EVTDESC524: I, [From.GetBestName], accept your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
EVTDESC525: I, [From.GetBestName], unfortunately have to decline your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
COUNCILOR_LAW_CHANGE_ON_LIEGE_REALM_NOTI: $COUNCILOR$ has decided to institute the $LAW$ Law in $TITLE$
VOTE_AS_FAVOR_OWNER_SETUP: Vote as favor owner on law change while returning favor
COUNCILOR_LAW_CHANGE_IN_LIEGE_REALM_SETU: Councilor initiating law change in liege's realm by using favor
COUNCILOR_LAW_CHANGE_IN_LIEGE_REALM_LOG: By calling in a Favor $COUNCILOR|Y$ has forced you to start a vote on the $LAW|Y$ Law in $TITLE|Y$.
ALLIANCE_BROKEN_LOG: The alliance between $CHAR$ and $ALLY$ has broken down
VOTE_AS_REQUESTOR_LOG: $CHARACTER|Y$ has voted $VOTE$ $LAW|Y$ due to $REQUESTOR$ requesting support.
VOTE_AS_REQUESTOR_SETUP: Vote as requestor requesting support on law change
LOWER_RELATIVE_POWER_WITH_ALLIES: Army size with allies is less than $VAL|Y%$ of that of $OTHER|Y$ with allies.
HIGHER_RELATIVE_POWER_WITH_ALLIES: Army size with allies is at least $VAL|Y%$ of that of $OTHER|Y$ with allies.
FAVOR_INVITE: Force acceptance of an Invite to Court proposal
FAVOR_JOIN_WAR: Force acceptance of a Call to Arms
FAVOR_EMBARGO: Force acceptance of an Ask to Embargo proposal
FAVOR_JOIN_FACTION: Force someone to join factions you lead
FAVOR_COUNCIL_POSITION: Force your liege to give you a Council position
FAVOR_PREVENT_ENFORCE_PEACE: Prevent or force a Realm Peace from your liege
